overview:
Luke Williams is a leading speaker, educator, and consultant in the areas of innovation strategy and disruptive thinking. For more than a decade, he has worked internationally with industry leaders like American Express, General Electric, Sony, Virgin, Disney, and Hewlett-Packard, to develop new products, services and business models.

Williams is a Fellow at frog designâ€”one of the most influential innovation companies in the worldâ€”and an Adjunct Professor of innovation at NYU Stern School of Business. He speaks throughout the international community, and his opinions have been featured in BusinessWeek, Fast Company, and The Wall Street Journal. He is the author of the book Disrupt: Think the Unthinkable to Spark Transformation in Your Business (FT Press, 2010).
